title: Chicken Manchuria menu card photo asset wiring

requirements.summary: Add Chicken Manchuria generated photo asset and ensure the Home page menu card uses it via the existing menuItemImageMap (not a fallback).
acceptanceCriteria: The file frontend/public/assets/generated/chicken-manchuria.dim_300x300.jpg exists in the build output.
On the Home page, the menu item with uuid "chicken-manchuria" renders using /assets/generated/chicken-manchuria.dim_300x300.jpg (not a fallback image).

file_operations.description: Add the required generated image asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/chicken-manchuria.dim_300x300.jpg so it is available as a static file in the build output.

Confirm/ensure menuItemImageMap contains an entry for uuid "chicken-manchuria" pointing to "/assets/generated/chicken-manchuria.dim_300x300.jpg", and that Home page cards always use getMenuItemImage(item) so this item does not fall back to a generic image.
